photoeffects: My Colors (My Colors Off, Vivid, Neutral, Sepia, Black & White, Custom Color (limited))
isosensitivity: ¹ Standard Output Sensitivity / Recommended Exposure Index. According to ISO 12232:2006 (20th April 2006) which specifies the method for assigning and reporting ISO speed ratings for digital still cameras. This does not apply to Digital IXUS WIRELESS.
batteries: 2x Size-AA Alkaline or NiMH Batteries(NB4-300) (Alkalines supplied)
movielength: ¹ Depending on memory card speed / capacity
continuousshooting: ¹ Large/Fine with LCD monitor off ² Depending on memory card speed / capacity
batterylife: ¹ Based on the CIPA Standard and using the batteries and memory card format supplied with the camera, except where indicated.
meteringmodes: Evaluative, Centre-weighted average, Spot (centre or linked to Face Detection AF frame)
stillimagetype: JPEG compression, (Exif 2.2 [Exif Print] compliant) / Design rule for Camera File system, Digital Print Order Format [DPOF] Version 1.1 compliant
modes: Auto, Manual, Portrait, Landscape, Night Snapshot, Indoor, Kids & Pets, Movie, Special Scene (Foliage, Snow, Beach, Fireworks, Night Scene, Aquarium)
zoom: ¹ Depending on the image size selected ² Digital zoom available for still image and standard movie modes only. Optical zoom may not be available during movie recording.
powersupplybatterychargers: Battery Charger Kit CBK4-300, Ni-MH Batteries NB4-300, AC Adapter Kit ACK800
